name: pasteurized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of milk, cheese, eggs, and some other foods) having been heated at a controlled temperature for a fixed period of time in order to kill bacteria: She drinks only organic pasteurized milk. Commercially manufactured ice cream is typically made with pasteurised eggs or egg products.
More examplesFewer examplesSome feta cheese is made with pasteurized milk, some isn’t.Raw milk advocates say that the unpasteurized product is healthier than pasteurized milk.Our raw milk cheeses will have a sharper flavour than our pasteurized cheeses.Pasteurized caviar will last up to one year in the pantry.
